title: Accessibility & ADA Compliance Services | Westtown Websites
description: Ensure your website meets WCAG and ADA standards with Westtown Websites. Our accessibility audits and compliance services help make your site inclusive while protecting your business from legal risks.

aboutSection.heading: Accessible Websites Built for Compliance and Inclusivity.
aboutSection.content:
We understand the challenges small business owners face, especially when it comes to accessibility. You might not know where to start, and the fear of legal consequences can feel overwhelming. That's why we're here—to guide you through every step, making sure your website is compliant, user-friendly, and accessible to all.

Our experience goes beyond just meeting legal requirements. We focus on making your website easy to use for everyone, creating a welcoming and seamless experience for all visitors. Let us help you build a website that not only meets standards but also supports your business growth by being inclusive and functional for all users.

masonryLayout.title: WCAG Accessibility Compliance
masonryLayout.description: We ensure your website meets the latest Web Content Accessibility Guidelines (WCAG 2.1), making your site usable by everyone, including people with disabilities. Our audits cover keyboard navigation, screen reader compatibility, color contrast, and more. This not only protects your business from legal risks but also opens your site to a larger audience. Learn more.

masonryLayout.title: ADA Legal Compliance
masonryLayout.description: Compliance with the Americans with Disabilities Act (ADA) is crucial for businesses operating in the U.S. A rise in web accessibility lawsuits—up 14% in 2022—means it's vital to make your website legally compliant. We perform regular accessibility audits to ensure your website adheres to ADA regulations, protecting your business from lawsuits. Read the report.

masonryLayout.title: SEO Benefits of Accessibility
masonryLayout.description: Accessible websites rank better. Search engines reward user-friendly sites with better visibility. Adding alt text, improving structure, and making content navigable by screen readers also enhances your SEO. Accessibility improvements can lead to better organic rankings and increased traffic. Learn how accessibility boosts SEO.

masonryLayout.title: Core Web Vitals & Accessibility
masonryLayout.description: Core Web Vitals and accessibility go hand-in-hand in creating a fast, user-friendly website. Google now considers both performance and accessibility when ranking websites. Ensuring fast load times, visual stability, and interactive content that’s accessible to everyone helps improve your Core Web Vitals and boosts your site’s rankings. Learn more about Core Web Vitals.

masonryLayout.title: Accessible E-commerce Solutions
masonryLayout.description: Accessible e-commerce platforms ensure that all users, including those with disabilities, can shop seamlessly. From keyboard navigation to screen reader-friendly checkout processes, we make sure your online store is accessible and compliant. This leads to better user experiences and increased sales from a broader audience.

masonryLayout.title: Keyboard Navigation & Screen Reader Compatibility
masonryLayout.description: We make sure your site is easy to navigate without a mouse, ensuring compatibility with screen readers and providing descriptive alt text for images. This enhances the user experience for visitors with disabilities and aligns your website with legal compliance requirements.

faqItems.question: How long does it take to build a custom website?
faqItems.answer: A five-page brochure site can be live in as little as two weeks, provided our communication is consistent, and client deliverables are ready.

faqItems.question: Do you use templates for your websites?
faqItems.answer: We use custom design templates and reusable components that we’ve built. This ensures your website is tailored to your needs while also being efficient and scalable.

faqItems.question: Can I update my custom website on my own?
faqItems.answer: Yes! We integrate content management systems (CMS) like WordPress, enabling you to update and manage your website without technical expertise.

faqItems.question: How do you ensure my website is optimized for SEO?
faqItems.answer: We incorporate SEO best practices into every website, from metadata and alt text to schema markup and fast load times, ensuring better visibility on search engines.

faqItems.question: Will my custom website be mobile-friendly?
faqItems.answer: Absolutely. All of our websites are fully responsive, designed to look and function smoothly on any device, from desktops to smartphones.
